name: B. Journey
input: InputThe first line contains one integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \le t \le 10^4$$$) — the number of test cases.Each test case consists of one line containing four integers $$$n$$$, $$$a$$$, $$$b$$$, $$$c$$$ ($$$1 \le n \le 10^9$$$; $$$1 \le a, b, c \le 10^6$$$).
output: OutputFor each test case, output one integer — the day on which Monocarp will have walked at least $$$n$$$ kilometers in total and will complete his journey.
